trans-unit.source: Represents a namespace declaration.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace> can be used to represent a namespace declaration.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Name%2A> property specifies the name of the namespace.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Imports%2A> property contains the namespace import directives for the namespace.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Types%2A> property contains the type declarations for the namespace.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Comments%2A> property contains the comments that apply at the namespace level.

In some languages, a namespace can function as a container for type declarations; all types in the same namespace are accessible without using fully-qualified type references, if the there is no conflict between type names.
Use fully qualified type references to avoid potential ambiguity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> class using the specified name.
The name of the namespace being declared.
Gets the comments for the namespace.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the comments for the namespace.
Gets the collection of namespace import directives used by the namespace.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespaceImportCollection"></xref> that indicates the namespace import directives used by the namespace.
Gets or sets the name of the namespace.
The name of the namespace.
An event that will be raised the first time the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Comments"></xref> collection is accessed.
An event that will be raised the first time the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Imports"></xref> collection is accessed.
An event that will be raised the first time the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace.Types"></xref> collection is accessed.
Gets the collection of types that the namespace contains.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclarationCollection"></xref> that indicates the types contained in the namespace.
